rules.author: context-sherpa-community
rules.description: Detects the use of string formatting functions like fmt.Sprintf inside database calls, which is a common SQL injection vector. Promotes the use of safe, parameterized queries.

rules.description: Finds function calls that return an error as their final argument but the error is not assigned or checked, often by assigning it to the blank identifier `_`.
